answerText: Kingdom of Spain [or Reino de España][10] The aforementioned play, Life Is a Dream, was written by this playwright active during the Spanish Golden Age along with Lope de Vega.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 8 | 7 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A play from this country describes how Rosaura's arrival from Russia leads to Segismundo becoming King of Poland. For 10 points each: [10] Name this European country whose Golden Age writers included the author of The Sheep Well, Lope de Vega.
